summary: The third installment of my city enhancements.  A detailed, lore-friendly, rags and riches overhaul of Riften.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DHCpmWV.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pAdtSMs.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50336/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D50336&pUp=1][img]http://i.imgur.com/Z3RmaTU.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50336/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D50336&pUp=1][img]http://i.imgur.com/q3YTEkV.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50336/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D50336&pUp=1][img]http://i.imgur.com/HqPDlRQ.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51059/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/4RhSVU6.png[/img][/url][url=http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-4381774-1-1.html][img]http://i.imgur.com/SZLYoof.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56211/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/baq5z3L.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58596/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/1CO2UDd.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58288/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/9GknPkF.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58275/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/sa4YQJf.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/GBGJ1kI.png[/img]
[youtube]yOgrZPpn0qE[/youtube][youtube]myXyTRuUk08[/youtube]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/koY5rDv.png[/img]
[spoiler]
Q: Are there any requirements? What happened to the no DLC version?
[i]A: Dragonborn DLC is required. At this time, I do not have the time to support two versions of the mod, as such only the DLC version will be available in the near future. The original non DLC version will remain available as a download until I can update it.[/i]

Q: What are the differences between the versions?
[i]A: The DLC version uses assets from Dragonborn around Brand-Shei's stand, and allows him to sell Solstheim items. It also has some minor Dragonborn clutter in other parts of the city. The non-DLC version uses alternative decorations.[/i]

Q: Translations?
[i]A: If you would like to make a translation, please contact me for permission. Current translations are linked by the country flags on the top of the page.[/i]

Q: Compatibility?

[b]Compatible:[/b]
- Nernie's City & Thief Packs
- Mods that change interior Honeyside
- Knotted Nook
- Sexy Riften

[b]Incompatible:[/b]
- Better Riften
- Fine Goods from Morrowind, Morrowind Imports, & similar (already included in this mod)
- Riften Thief Edition
- Long Lost Smelters of Skyrim

Q: Full features list?
- Purchase goods from the two new merchants
- Almost no buildings are untouched for a truly immersive feel
- Rats scurry around all parts of the city (watch your toes!)
- Hanging rags, twisting stairs, and a "glorified" ratway entrance await you in the canals
- Brand-Shei sells Morrowind goods (and his stall shows it)
- Lore-friendly letters throughout the city (including an Oblivion easter egg!)
- Actually use a smelter
- New models and textures throughout the city
- And so much more! The pictures don't even do it justice!
[/spoiler]
[youtube]0Uv3Cm2ZSD0[/youtube][youtube]Rf5cmakUp1M[/youtube]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37460/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/a39LExJ.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43701/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/7ZWD7jF.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50336/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/5rabo8J.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58110/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/i2Vd2sQ.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58151/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/gJ5xK1e.png[/img][/url]
[size=5]Permission Notes[/size]
[b]None of my mods or their assets may be redistributed or utilized in other mods in any
circumstance, paid or free.  My mods are exclusive to the nexus and my
tumblr, when applicable.  If you see them elsewhere, including the steam
workshop, they are stolen and I will not condone or support these
versions.

Authorized translations will always be linked in the description and some of these may be hosted on other sites as per my and
the translator's discretion.[/b][/center]
author: BluePianoTwo

files.name: Dawn of Riften 1.1
files.changelogHtml:
(Released June 1st, 2014)
- New models and textures for the rats
- Fixes low-hanging Ragged Flagon sign
- Removes ladders and roof trap doors due to popular demand
- Reduces clutter in some areas, adds clutter in others
- More details around Riften main gate & blacksmith shop
